# Install with pip
pip install axiomtradeapi

# Import the library
from axiomtradeapi import AxiomTradeClient

# Initialize client
client = AxiomTradeClient(auth_token="your_token")

# Get real-time balance
balance = await client.GetBalance("wallet_address")
print(f"Balance: {balance['sol']} SOL")

# Subscribe to new token launches
async def handle_new_tokens(tokens):
    for token in tokens:
        print(f"ðŸš€ New token: {token['tokenName']}")
        # Your trading logic here

await client.subscribe_new_tokens(handle_new_tokens)
